products.name: Apple MacBook Pro
products.description: Apple MacBook Pro with 14-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, M1 Pro chip, and up to 32GB of unified memory.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S21 with 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Exynos 2100 (International) or Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 (USA), and up to 8GB of RAM.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise-Cancelling Over-the-Ear Headphones with up to 30 hours of battery life.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: Dell XPS 13 with 13.4-inch FHD+ display, Intel Core i7, and up to 16GB of RAM.

products.name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
products.description: Apple iPhone 13 Pro with 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, and up to 1TB of storage.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
products.description: Bose QuietComfort 35 II Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones with up to 20 hours of battery life.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
products.description: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 with 11-inch TFT display, Snapdragon 865+, and up to 8GB of RAM.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: Sony PlayStation 5 with custom RDNA 2 GPU, custom AMD Zen 2 CPU, and ultra-high-speed SSD.

products.name: Microsoft Xbox Series X
products.description: $Microsoft Xbox Series X with custom RDNA 2 GPU, custom AMD Zen 2 CPU, and ultra-high-speed SSD.

products.name: Apple Watch Series 7
products.description: Apple Watch Series 7 with always-on Retina display, S7 SiP with 64-bit dual-core processor, and up to 18 hours of battery life.

products.name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
products.description: Google Pixel 6 Pro with a smooth display, Google Tensor SoC, and up to 12GB of RAM.

products.name: Amazon Echo (4th Gen)
products.description: Amazon Echo (4th Gen) with premium sound, smart home hub, and Alexa.

products.name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
products.description: Nintendo Switch OLED Model with a vibrant OLED screen, adjustable stand for tabletop mode, and enhanced audio for handheld and tabletop play.
